venue_description: The Kentucky Horse Park is a working horse farm, international equestrian competition venue and educational theme park that opened in 1978. It is located off Kentucky State Highway 1973 (Iron Works Pike) near Lexington and hosts major events throughout the yearhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kentucky_Horse_Park.
sourced: Kentucky Horse Park, Kentucky Spring and Summer schedule

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Kentucky Horse Park (venue_uid=khp-venue)","Location":"city: Lexington city_uid=lexington, state:KY state_uid=ky.","GEO context":"lat=38.1507051, lon=-84.52000699999999 placeid=EjI0MDg5IElyb24gV29ya3MgUGt3eSAjMmMsIExleGluZ3RvbiwgS1kgNDA1MTEsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJeagqDStHQogRGdxiEjNnP24SAjJj.","Official venue link":"https://kyhorsepark.com/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://kyhorsepark.com/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "khp-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Kentucky Horse Park — Venue Profile (Lexington, KY)",
  "section_overview": "Bluegrass horsepower at scale. Kentucky Horse Park runs multiple rings in parallel, so organize by ring cluster and live off in-gate texts. Warm-up rings are generous but get busy before eq and derby cards—grab a schooling window right after a drag for the cleanest read and set your canter with one simple vertical. Jog strip locations are clearly posted; arrive tacked and tidy with numbers front and center, quick forward trot, and a microfiber towel in your pocket. Vendor row is a full-service lifeline (studs, spur straps, gloves, stitching fixes, last-minute shads), and stabling rows are laid out with direct lines to schooling—keep fans secured, trunks flush, and ring bags pre-packed so you can pivot between hunter and GP schedules without scrambling. Footing is modern all-weather and rides best once it packs; expect frequent drags and water. Plan for Bluegrass weather mood swings: cool mornings, sun by mid-day, pop-up showers. Golf carts and bikes help, but a smart loop (stabling → warm-up → ring → vendor row) saves scratches and steps.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Kentucky Horse Park",
    "Lexington KY",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit",
    "all-weather footing",
    "ring flow"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your KHP week like a pro",
  "section_img": "https://kyhorsepark.com/",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings and warm-up areas at Kentucky Horse Park in Lexington, Kentucky",
  "section_link": "https://kyhorsepark.com/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for Kentucky Horse Park: warm-up strategy, jog strip details, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and ring-to-ring tactics for A-circuit hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Kentucky Horse Park — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, warm-ups, jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing so your team stays efficient all week in Lexington.",
  "section_search_title": "Kentucky Horse Park Venue Profile — Lexington, KY",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of KHP: schooling cadence, jog strip, vendor row, stabling setup, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for KHP",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up cadence: best reads right after a drag—build your last oxer then.",
      "Map your loop: stabling → warm-up → ring → vendor row; avoid cross-park hikes.",
      "Jog strip kit: towel, hoof oil, alcohol spritz; numbers visible and a forward trot.",
      "Footing feel: improves as it packs; set canter with a simple vertical early.",
      "In-gate comms: monitor texts, be staged two trips out with a spare crop and hole punch.",
      "Derby/GP days: earlier schooling wins—crowds spike 60–90 minutes pre-card.",
      "Stabling ops: fans secured, trunks tight, ring bag stocked (stud kit, gloves, towel).",
      "Weather swing: layers in the bag; Bluegrass showers pass fast but soak leather.",
      "Vendor row timing: hit it between drags, not at last call, for stress-free fixes.",
      "Team roles: one tack runner, one ring runner; radios keep scratches off the board."
    ]
  }
}

{
  "venue_uid": "khp-venue",
  "bucket": "am",
  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",
    "max_distance_m": 5000,
    "price_range": "$$",
    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],
    "hours_requirements": { "opens_by_or_before": "10:30", "days": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"] },
    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "name": "Josie’s",
      "approx_drive": "7 min / 2.5 mi",
      "distance_m": 3700,
      "cuisine": "Cafe, Breakfast, American",
      "opens_at": "07:00",

      "safety_notes": "popular on weekends; weekdays quicker for show mornings",

    },
    {

      "distance_m": 4400,
      "cuisine": "Coffee, Bakery, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "06:30",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["donuts", "croissants", "bagels", "coffee", "cold brew"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "small-batch donuts sell out early; best before 9am",

    },
    {
      "name": "First Watch – Lexington",
      "approx_drive": "10 min / 4.5 mi",
      "distance_m": 4500,
      "cuisine": "Cafe, Brunch, American",
      "opens_at": "07:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["avocado toast", "multigrain pancakes", "hash browns", "breakfast sandwiches", "cold brew"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "reliable chain, busy on weekends; weekday mornings best",
      "source_link": "https://www.firstwatch.com/menu"
    },
    {

      "approx_drive": "11 min / 4.8 mi",
      "distance_m": 4800,
      "cuisine": "Breakfast, Cafe, American",
      "opens_at": "06:30",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["omelets", "waffles", "breakfast burritos", "biscuits & gravy", "coffee"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "large portions; service moves quickly in mornings",

}

venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), Kentucky-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Kentucky Horse Park in Lexington, KY is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: The Kentucky Horse Park is a working horse farm, international equestrian competition venue and educational theme park that opened in 1978. It is located off Kentucky State Highway 1973 (Iron Works Pike) near Lexington and hosts major events throughout the yearhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kentucky_Horse_Park.
